title: California Jerky Factory, Inc. Recalls Beef Jerky Products Due to Possible Processing Deviation
summary: WASHINGTON, March 21, 2018 California Jerky Factory, Inc., a South El Monte, Calif. establishment, is recalling approximately 1,238 pounds of beef jerky products due to a processing deviation that may have led to under processing of products, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and...
